item.description:
Being ambitious to contribute to our understanding of how the biosphere and the atmosphere interact in the Earth system, I study how natural systems function, encompassing forest, microbiome, and soil, with an eventual goal of disentangling their interactions with environment as an integrated ecosystem applying a methodological framework of interwoven theory- and data-driven approaches.

Now I am a Postdoctoral Scholar at University of California Irvine working with Dr. Steven Allison on microbial systems composition, structure, function, and dynamics toward the understanding of soil microorganisms in regulating biosphere-atmosphere interactions.

For more about my research experience, publications, and research vision, please check out My Website
